Name: LongPath
About the game: One day you get up in the middle of the night and want to get away from your peaceful village and want to go on an adventure, so one night you sneak away. But you didn't expect it to turn out like this. You accompanies the main protagonist in this action-packed 2D rogue lite on his quest. If you die you restart the game from the beginning.
